name: Shoyu Chicken With Teri Glaze
keywords: chicken thigh, chinese five-spice powder, soy sauce, main course
recipeIngredient: Green onions and bean sprouts for garnish (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine soy sauce, orange juice, mirin, brown sugar, garlic, ginger and 1/2 cup water in a large skillet, and blend well. Add the cilantro and five-spice powder. Bring to a boil, add the chicken, partly cover the skillet, and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Remove chicken from sauce. Set aside, and keep warm.
Make the teri glaze, by blending the cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water into a smooth paste. Bring 1 cup of the sauce to a boil, and stir in paste to thicken into a glaze.
Brush the chicken with the glaze. Garnish with green onions and bean sprouts.
